page.title: 07THE PUB AT RODINGTON
page.content: THE PUB IS QUITE MODERN TODAY BECAUSE THERE ARE ALL SORTS OF GADGETS AND PUMPS TO MAKE JOBS EASIER. THE INSIDE HAS BEEN REFURBISHED. THERE IS A LOUNGE BAR AND A PUBLIC BAR. IN THE LOUNGE THERE ARE RED SEATS AND CARPETS. ABOVE THE LOUNGE BAR THERE ARE RED LIGHTS.THERE IS A LONG OAK BAR. IT IS VERY COMFORTABLE. IN THE HALL BETWEEN THE TWO BARS THERE IS A CIGARETTE MACHINE AND CLOAK ROOMS. THE PUBLIC BAR IS VERY BIG. FROM IT YOU CAN GET TO A POOL TABLE. THERE ARE LOTS OF OLD TABLES AND CHAIRS IN THIS BAR. THERE ARE NO CARPETS IN THE BAR. THEY ALSO SELL MEALS IN THE PUB. PEOPLE TRAVEL TO THE PUB FROM MILES AROUND FOR THE FOOD. SITUATED IN THE CENTRE OF THE VILLAGE THE PUB IS ALSO THE CENTRE OF THE VILLAGE SOCIAL LIFE AND A MEETING PLACE FOR THE LOCAL PEOPLE.
